attributes.long-description:
Worms™ Ultimate Mayhem is the definitive 3D Worms™ game! Load your weapons and experience a new dimension in destructive turn-based cartoon action! With over 60 single-player missions, online or local multi-player for up to 4 players, 5 multi-player modes, and unprecedented customization and fully destructible environments, it’s the ultimate 3D Worms™ collection!
- A vast array of single-player content, ranging from shooting challenges to speed runs, whilst a collection of crazy missions make up the extensive single-player campaign.
- Full local and online play, for up to 4 players, over a wealth of game modes such as “Statue Defend”, “Homelands” or “Deathmatch”.
- Massive customization options - players are able to name their teams, customise the appearance of their worms, create new weapons, and even customise the game settings to their own liking.
- Fully destructible environments, new picture-in-picture display and numerous other gameplay improvements and enhancements.

Worms™ Ultimate Mayhem. Developed by Team17 Software Ltd. © 2011. Team17 Software Ltd, Worms™, Worms™ 3D and Worms™ Ultimate Mayhem are trademarks or registered trademarks of Team17 Software Limited. Original concept by Andy Davidson. All other trademarks, copyrights and logos are property of their respective owners. Developed and published by Team17 Software Limited.
